tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following functions will have its nth derivative equal to 0 over its entire domain for sufficiently large values of n?
bonus_question: -   –  The values of y that will satisfy the system of equations 2x^(2) + 6x + 5y + 1 = 0 and 2x + y + 3 = 0 can be found by solving which of the following equations?
